bibl.title: Three Rolls of the Early Septuagint: Genesis and Deuteronomy. A Photographic Edition prepared in collaboration with the International Photographic Archive of the Association Internationale de Papyrologues, with preface, introduction and notes by Ludwig Koenen.
bibl.seg: Aly Zaki, Three Rolls of the Early Septuagint: Genesis and Deuteronomy. A Photographic Edition prepared in collaboration with the International Photographic Archive of the Association Internationale de Papyrologues, with preface, introduction and notes by Ludwig Koenen. (Papyrologische Texte und Abhandlungen. 27.)
Bonn, R. Habelt, 1980, 4Â°, xiii-143 pp., 57 pll.

C.R. par H.W. Attridge, JBL 101 (1982) p. 435. - Jean Bingen, ChrEg 57 (1982) No. 114, pp. 355-356. - J. O'Callaghan, StPap 21 (1982) pp. 59-60. - A. Passoni Dell'Acqua, Aegyptus 61 (1981) pp. 266-268.
